item.title: What to Know About the Liverpool FC Parade Car Crash
item.description: Almost 50 people, including four children, were injured on Monday after a driver plowed into a crowd that had been celebrating Liverpool F.C.’s Premie...

item.title: Zelensky Is Expected in Berlin as Merz Steps Forward as Key Backer of Ukraine
item.description: A likely focus of talks between the two leaders will be military aid and whether Germany will provide Ukraine with the Taurus cruise missile.

item.title: Congo’s Former President Returns Home, Accused of Treason

item.title: Israeli Forces Said They Killed a ‘Terrorist.’ He Was 14 Years Old.

item.title: How the Liverpool Parade Car Crash Unfolded
item.description: After a car plowed into crowds celebrating their team’s Premier League title, camaraderie and jubilation dissolved into dread.
